body: for those who are in doubt if the MC's girlfriend was forced because of that scene in which she was going to try to kill herself, well, I used a translation app to translate the images and see how it would solve everything.  Well, she wasn't being threatened in anything like that, in the bathroom scene she admits that she stopped meeting the MC to go on a date with other men, she even says that now it was impossible for her to live without a man, the  that makes the MC angry, at the end of the conversation she says she was going to treat the MC well from now on, apparently she’s sorry, that’s why the conversation ended, then the scene of the final three sex happens, the scene in  that the girlfriend was fighting with her sister, her sister questions the girlfriend about the betrayal, then the girlfriend lets out an answer and nothing to do with the question, in the end she seems to have regretted it, but it doesn't change the fact that it is  a shameless bitch
